member.name: IInitializeWithItem.Initialize

param.name: grfMode
param.para: One of the following STGM values that indicate the access mode for psi.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeWithItem
member.summary: Exposes a method used to initialize a handler, such as a property handler, thumbnail handler, or preview handler, with an .
